author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content:
18.001 and 18.012 are the first shirts that I would   
actually wear. I guess I really like hands.

18.013 had a font problem. If it's yours please resend.   
   
Speaking of name-that-tune, perhaps we can all play   
find-the-Myriad. (You know, the default   
substitution font in Illustrator.)   
   
18.012 is very cool, but can we get a "ph" in there?
Is that PH as in PHAT? :wink:
if \_somebody\_ doesn't produce 18.008, I'm going to cry!

hmmmm...   
   
18.008 is really very interesting...   
typophile thing!
no. 7!! makes me love cooper even more.

I'm with PlainClothes and Gustavo Ferreira.... I really like 18.008.   
   
Makes me wish I had designed it.... ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120083636im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
DT
